name: Irrigreen
0:
”Alexa, open my sprinklers.”
”Alexa, open my sprinklers and start watering.”
”Alexa, open my sprinklers and run zone one.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my sprinklers
des:
With Irrigreen, you can start your sprinklers, stop your sprinklers, and inquire about the status of your system all with voice commands.

In order to use this Alexa skill, you will need a working Irrigreen sprinkler system installed along with an active Irrigreen account. Your account will be used to link with this skill, so please have your account credentials ready. You will not be able to use this skill without an Irrigreen account and will need to launch the skill from the Irrigreen 2 IOS app.

First, make sure that you have opened this skill from within the IOS app and complete account linking for the skill. After account linking, your controller number should automatically be added to your Alexa account. If you have multiple controllers associated with your account, you will need to specify the controller you would like to add. This can be done by saying, "Alexa, tell my sprinklers to add controller _____" with your controller number at the end. You will only be able to add controllers that are linked to your Irrigreen account. Please note that currently only one controller can be added to Alexa at a time, so adding a controller when one is already stored will overwrite the previously added controller.

Once your controller is configured, you will be able to interact with it. Open the Alexa skill by saying, "Alexa, open my sprinklers". You are able to perform a quick run of a zone or of your entire system. To do a quick run of the whole system, say, "start watering". To do a quick run of a certain zone, say, "run zone ___" followed by the zone number, or say, "run ___" followed by the name you have given the zone. Then, at any time, you can tell your skill to "stop watering" and all current watering will cease.

You can also ask if your system is watering by asking, “are my sprinklers watering?” and Alexa will tell you if your system is currently watering and in what zone.

To end your session with Alexa, you can say “that’s all”, “I’m done”, or let the Alexa session timeout on its own.

Requires activation in the IrriGreen 2 iOS app
